arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
يَا مَنْ لَا يَحْتَاجُ إِلَى التَّفْسِيرِ وَالْسُؤَالِ
يَا عَالِمًا بِمَا فِيْ صُدُورِ العَالَمِيْنَ
صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِهِ الطَّاهِرِينَ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah; on this day, (please] guide me to the virtuous deeds;
And settle on this day all my needs and hopes;
O He Who does not require explanation or wonderment;
O He Who knows what is hidden in the chest of the peoples.
(please] send blessings upon Muhammad and his Household—the immaculate.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
yā man lā yaḥtāju ilat tafsīri wasu-āl
